docblock.description: Checks the response for a HTTP digest challenge, and sets the `$challenge` property if so.
docblock.long-description: The response must contain the HTTP status code 401 and the WWW-Authenticate header to set $challenge.

docblock.description: Gets the digest credentials to send in an authentication header.

property.name: $status_text_default
property.default: array('100' => 'Continue', '101' => 'Switching Protocols', '200' => 'OK', '201' => 'Created', '202' => 'Accepted', '203' => 'Non-Authoritative Information', '204' => 'No Content', '205' => 'Reset Content', '206' => 'Partial Content', '300' => 'Multiple Choices', '301' => 'Moved Permanently', '302' => 'Found', '303' => 'See Other', '304' => 'Not Modified', '305' => 'Use Proxy', '307' => 'Temporary Redirect', '400' => 'Bad Request', '401' => 'Unauthorized', '402' => 'Payment Required', '403' => 'Forbidden', '404' => 'Not Found', '405' => 'Method Not Allowed', '406' => 'Not Acceptable', '407' => 'Proxy Authentication Required', '408' => 'Request Timeout', '409' => 'Conflict', '410' => 'Gone', '411' => 'Length Required', '412' => 'Precondition Failed', '413' => 'Request Entity Too Large', '414' => 'Request-URI Too Long', '415' => 'Unsupported Media Type', '416' => 'Requested Range Not Satisfiable', '417' => 'Expectation Failed', '500' => 'Internal Server Error', '501' => 'Not Implemented', '502' => 'Bad Gateway', '503' => 'Service Unavailable', '504' => 'Gateway Timeout', '505' => 'HTTP Version Not Supported')

docblock.description: List of default HTTP status messages.

Require verification of SSL certificate used?
Location of Certificate Authority file on local filesystem which should be used with the $ssl_verify_peer option to authenticate the identity of the remote peer.
If $ssl_cafile is not specified or if the certificate is not found there, this directory path is searched for a suitable certificate.
docblock.long-description: The path must be a correctly hashed certificate directory.

docblock.description: Path to local certificate file on filesystem.
docblock.long-description: This must be a PEM encoded file which contains your certificate and private key. It can optionally contain the certificate chain of issuers.

docblock.description: Passphrase with which the $ssl_local_cert file was encoded.
